product_name: Showers Pass Club Visible Bike Pants - Men's
long_description: When you hit the road, the Showers Pass Club Visible bike pants ensure you never have to choose between staying dry and staying visible. Durable nylon fabric features a waterproof, breathable laminate and taped seams for total weather protection. Neon yellow fabric has reflective trim that is visible from front, back and sides. Articulated knees and gusseted crotch encourage free range of motion. Dual leg straps keep pant legs away from chain and crank. Ankle zips allow easy on/off over shoes. Zippered hand pockets feature water-resistant zippers. Rip-and-stick tabs at waist make the Showers Pass Club Visible bike pants compatible with suspenders (not included).
short_description: When you hit the road, the Showers Pass Club Visible bike pants ensure you never have to choose between staying dry and staying visible.
